remarks: A subclass condition on the members of two indexed classes ` C ( x ) ` and ` D ( y ) ` that implies a subclass relation on their indexed unions.  Generalization of Proposition 8.6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 59. Compare ~ uniss2 .  (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2004.)
statement:
iunss2 $p |- ( A. x e. A E. y e. B C C_ D -> U_ x e. A C C_ U_ y e. B D ) $.
$d B x $.
$d C y $.
$d D x $.
$d x y $.
